name: install-wizard
description: Web-based installer wizard for Asterisk application.

scripts.start:all: concurrently -n "wizard,demiurge,admin,ottb,dci,point,workspace" -c "blue,green,yellow,cyan,magenta,red,white" "npm run start:install-wizard" "npm run start:vss-demiurge" "npm run start:admin-backend" "npm run start:ottb" "npm run start:dci" "npm run start:point" "npm run start:workspace"
scripts.start:services: concurrently -n "ottb,dci,point,workspace" -c "cyan,magenta,red,white" "npm run start:ottb" "npm run start:dci" "npm run start:point" "npm run start:workspace"

author: Your Name
